original_text: For seven days no leaven is to be found in your houses. If anyone eats what is leavened, that person will be cut off from the congregation of Israel, whether he is a sojourner or a native of the land.
korean_text: 이레 동안은 누룩이 너희 집에서 발견되지 아니하도록 하라 무릇 유교물을 먹는 자는 타국인이든지 본국에서 난 자든지를 막론하고 이스라엘 회중에서 끊어지리니

sentences.original_text: For seven days no leaven is to be found in your houses.
sentences.korean_translation: 이레 동안 너희 집에서는 누룩을 찾을 수 없다.

sentences.original_text: If anyone eats what is leavened,
that person will be cut off from the congregation of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 이스라엘 회중에서 끊쳐질 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: whether he is a sojourner or a native of the land.
